thread.section_title: Partykrakow.co.uk recenzje | Opinie konsumentów na temat Partykrakow.co.uk | www.partykrakow.com
thread.title: Adam Schindler
thread.title_full: Partykrakow.co.uk został oceniony przez Adam Schindler

author: Adam Schindler
title: Adam Schindler
text:
Just came back from Krakow and we loved it, there was 19 of us went and it was effortless for us to book, from the start Stuart was great, then our guide Dominika who sorted everything out for us, we were joined by Kate on a night out which made the night even better!
We went for the Epic Package and that's what it was, EPIC!
We got the party bus with big bertha what a way to start the stag do off! We also went shooting, vodka tasting and lots of guide bar crawls. There was 19 very happy men with the strip and steak night, loads of them were saying it's the best steak we've ever had.
Don't think twice about booking up, you'll not regret it, value for money? Oh yes, unreal.
Looking forward to coming back in the near future.
Thanks for a brilliant trip!
Adam.
